concept.title: Install Eucalyptus
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus installation packages are available for CentOS 6 and RHEL 6. The following sections show installation steps on each supported Linux distribution.

conbody.note: For , we recommend that you install each Eucalyptus component on a separate host. For example, if you are installing CLC, Walrus, CC, and SC, you will install each of these components on a separate host. You will also install each secondary component (the secondary CLC, Walrus, CC, and SC) on a separate host. In this case, you will need eight machines. Each additional cluster needs four more machines for its CCs and SCs. This does not account for NCs, which are not redundant.
